headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://assets.calendly.com https://calendly.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://assets.calendly.com; connect-src 'self' https://api.calendly.com; frame-src 'self' https://calendly.com;
